page.title: 08RECREATION IN TRELAWNYD
page.content: There are now facilities within the village for any outdoor organised physical recreation. The only village sporting teams, are Darts teams that meet in the local pub. Only a small number of the residents travel to either Rhyl or Prestatyn to take advantage of the facilities at the Sports Centres, however, many Enjoy country walks or horse riding at the local farm. This may be well reflective upon the age of the residents and their country way of life. In the survey many expressed a desire to see a Bowling Club within the village, with its tranquil ways blending in with the countryside, but no one was prepared to take the initiative to try to find a club for themselves. Some men are members of the Dyserth Bowling Club which plays in the Rhyl and District Leagues.
